eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 12:07 AM ON OCT 15, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:14 AM OCT 16, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for the Phoenix Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Phoenix PD is looking for Hispanic male, Valentino Trujillo, last seen on foot wearing a grey t-shirt with grey and white shorts. He is described as five feet ten inches tall and weighs 150 pounds with brown eyes and bald head. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
